alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 27 at 3:50PM EDT until September 28 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THURSDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Lower Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of locally heavy rainfall with rising King tides will result in brackish flooding during the morning high tides. Water levels may reach a few inches higher than this morning`s high tide.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
